name: Counter-Strike: Source

reviews:
10/10
This game is so fun, has the least amount of sweats I have seen in a shooter game which just makes it more fun for casual players like myself.

10/10
This game is so fun, has the least amount of sweats I have seen in a shooter game which just makes it more fun for casual players like myself.

I only got this game so that I could play on maps that use cs textures but when i actually played the game its not that great maybe it would be more fun if every player wasn't a hacker and if there was more that one server that has people playing that isn't modded but other that that the game is alright but you might as well play cs2 or csgo but its a source game so its pretty easy to make maps for it. I would recommend, but only because of the gmod maps.
Really cool the way this game track stats in Steam, great game and active community.
Good og counter strike. Playing it mainly for surfing, so if you re into that, 100 % recommended. Lower pc requirements allows you to enjoy the gameplay at  it fullest!

This is my opinion the best counter-strike of all titles, This only takes like nearly 4 gigs to play and it runs well on older pc's. meanwhile CS:GO is very big. I really do love this counter-Strike. Source games are my favourite. CS:S My beloved.
I just wish Deathmatch mode was an option instead of just Standard when creating a server.
Way better then cs2, the German servers have epic rave mlg music when you win
saw some guys shooting it felt little weird at the start but then i came home turned on my pc and started playing, the game felt good
Love CS source despite it being older and despite what the naysayers have to say.
best counter strike honestly and runs on your grandma's laptop
classic and still harbors niche community modes like ZE, MG and surf
after 1y playing non steam version, finaly bought it

Css also known as Counter Strike Surf is the best way to play surf right now. 
I also played a game of like 10 vs 10 on dust but I can't really to find servers like that anymore. If anyone know, where I can find servers like that pls tell me. 

Game is pretty nice tho
Man, this game is freaking older than Half-Life 2 lol. I honestly thought that Half-Life 2 came out first than css.
Very nice FPS game, better for the lower spec wise PC's yet holds up to the counter-strike franchises amazing standard.

Counter-Strike: Source will always be remembered as one of the greats in FPS history. It brought the classic CS gameplay to the Source engine with smoother graphics, cleaner movement, and that same intense, competitive spirit we all love.

10/10 game, costs a whole lot of money and the only thing that's changed is that barrels roll

short_description: Counter-Strike: Source blends Counter-Strike's award-winning teamplay action with the advanced technology of Source™ technology.
